title: Too Much Memory Consumption
content: Firefox is using too much ram in my Laptop. I'm using the latest version. I have 10gb of ram installed in my Laptop. I am using a mac system, when i open Activity Monitor it shows Firefox is using about 56gb of ram. Firefox Webcontent and Webextension are using Extra ram in seprate. But when i opened the inbuilt task manager of the Firefox it doen't show that much. Please Find attached images .

title: Firefox Crashes Because Of a background process
content:
hello there, i am using firefox on a old pc with duel cores only. There is a independent firefox process always running at my background using 100% of one of the core. because of just one core left for windows, it crashes frequently. Also no matter what i do on firefox or keep it idle, that process always takes 100% of the core. please tell me how to solve that.

ThankYou

title: Download Family Tree Maker .exe file
content: I sure hope you can. I purchase Family Tree Make 2019 recently and chose to download the program. I currently have Windows 10 and Microsoft Edge. But Edge will not allow me to download the program: it sends me a message that it is blocked. I've spent several hours trying to untangle this problem with FTM support and doing my own research on the 'net. The latest suggestion is that I try a different browser and Firefox was suggested. Now I'm not interested in becoming computer savvy; I just want to do genealogy. Is this something Firefox can support without thirteen pages of instruction? My second question: I will have to buy a new operating system this fall as Windows 10 is apparently no longer supported. What program would you recommend? Thanks ahead of time for your help.
creator: dyankeetwoo

title: Syncing browsers
content: Syncing of browsers means losing your bookmarks on the second computer. All I wanted was to sync a password for access to a program.
creator: dnlairways

title: FF "Applications" doesn't apply its own settings in download
content:
My money program uses an importer to download files directly (rather than saving to desktop & manually importing. The institutions' choices always include OFX, QFX, and QIF. The Application list in Options lists OFX -- in two places-- and QFX. Both are assigned to the importer.

No matter what format I choose, I have to browse for the importer (several clicks). To check, I downloaded account information for several accounts held with the same institution, cycling through those 3 formats. Same result each time. "Always do this" is checked and OFX and QFX are assigned to the importer as you can see in the screenshot.

Shouldn't FF be adding QIF when I download activity in that format? I certainly didn't add OFX or QFX manually! And can anyone explain why "Use importer" is broken?

TIA mm
creator: myobaya

title: Chromebook, Firefox for Linux. Display issues: Titlebar, Borders
content:
I'm using Firefox 88.0.1 for Linux on a Chromebook running OS Ver. 91.... which uses Linux 5.4.109-26059-gc7455b8ce0e0 right now - but started on Ver. 88 or something and whatever version of Linix that used. Anybody know why I can't turn the title bar off and why the screen rendering generally looks a bit flaky? I'm guessing it has something to do with the display manager that Google use and that it's not responding any of the Firefox settings. I've tried all the easy stuff like the title bar check box and other settings in about::config

Any ideas?
creator: martin.noakes

title: No puedo abrir ni google.com ni youtube.com SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER
content: Puedo entrar a cualquier página excepto por google y youtube, no tengo virus o al menos ninguno que pueda detectar avast, malwarebytes, adwcleaner, o windows defender. Solo utilizo windows defender as que el problema no son los antivirus. aún así el problema sigue siendo: " No se ha conectado: Posible problema de seguridad" y el codigo de error es SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER. Unicamente es con esas 2 páginas web. El problema se soluciona momentáneamente "reparando el sistema" con Awdcleaner pero cuando reinicio la pc el problema vuelve. El problema es el mismo con Chrome pero con Windows Edge todo funciona perfectamente.
creator: luargoma

title: Lockwise will not save a complete login URL
content:
Many sites do not have sign in on their hostname site. Without the full path, Lockwise does not come up/autofill. I tried the suggestion offered here to no avail. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1320590

https://auth.band.us is all Lockwise will save. Choosing email sign in brings up https://auth.band.us/email_login?keep_login=false which Lockwise does not recognize. I hoped setting signon.includeOtherSubdomainsInLookup = false on the about:config page would work but it does not.

Suggestions?
creator: couger69
